placeholder.name: Vasil HardFork
description: This NFT image was generated by Dall-E using a process to extrac
t the global reaction to an event. We have extracted all the des
criptive language used within social media posts in response to
the Vasil HardFork event, we then process that through an AI sto
ry teller that takes in these extraced sentiments to create a st
ory. This then gets used in Dall-E to generate an image that cap
tures a moment in time and represents the emotional response. Ou
r mission with this project is to bring value to the community b
y exploring as many ideas as possible. This NFT has a royalty th
at will be designated to go to the Charity Foundation listed in
this metadata, the purpose of this is to allow others to share t
heir excitement in a moment in time while helping benefit the go
als of the associated Charity Foundation

Event.Notes: This NFT captured the day of Vasil Day!
